name: D10 Myths
description:
🎲 Let your dice roll in the face of peril!

Play as a novice falconer Tiara and her feathered friend Uhu as they explore the coastal city of Mythton, known for its abundance of corn and nothing else, in her search for more friendly faces and normal day-to-day life.

But be careful, as broken memories may break the shrouded illusion of normality, and reveal the path for a world of darkness!

This is a free Hololive fangame that takes its story and main inspiration from the TTRPG series "Mythbreakers", where Calli runs a Hunter: The Vigil campaign with Kiara, Ina, Ame, and Gura.

🎲 Credits

Programming, game design, sprites and sound-effects: fie

Main theme/Credits song: WUNDER RiKU

Cover art: ant

Music: DOVA SYNDROME

Story: Mori Calliope, Takanashi Kiara, Ninomae Ina'nis, Watson Amelia, Gawr Gura

Emotional Support: My takodachi plushie

🎲 Controls ( keyboard )
  • Arrow-Keys / WSAD                : Move
  • Shift                                           : Run
  • z / ,                                             : Select
  • x / .                                             : Cancel
  • Esc                                             : Pause
🎲 Controls ( controller )
  • Sticks / D-Pad                          : Move
  • L1 / L2 / R1 / R2                      : Run
  • A  button                                 : Select
  • B  button                                 : Cancel
  • Start                                         : Pause

🎲 Disclaimer

This is a free fangame. I'm not affiliated nor endorsed by Hololive, Cover Corp, or any hololive talent in any capacity.

Feel free to do whatever type of content you would like to with the game, like videos and posts. It makes me super happy, so if you do, please share it with me.

🎲 Support

As mentioned before, this is a passion project that is totally free. 

If you would like to support me (thank you), you could do so while downloading the game, or through my ko-fi page. 

It is by no means required, but I really appreciate all the support! ❤️

* If the interfaces look weird in-game, like the phone menu and the dialogue box appearing glitched, try lowering the resolution in the settings or playing in windowed mode.
